info.name: Batoto Subway theme patch
info.description: Fixing and customizing new Batoto theme.
info.additionalInfo: (☞ﾟヮﾟ)☞ Since I'm too lazy to maintain this thing for public use, you're better off with Batoto Deep Subway This style is still viable, I just don't care about other aspects of the site besides manga reader. "Theme patch" is customizable, you can use your own colors and backgrounds: good patterns: http://www.transparenttextures.com/ color combinations: http://www.colorcombos.com/ ---- Default Batato colors: Sky - #59b6dd | Slate - #55728b | Blackcurrant - #8263d8 Watermelon - #ff74aa | Strawberry - #e04547 | Orange - #ed6949 Banana - #edbb46 | Apple - #edbb46 | Emerald - #4daf7c Chocolate - #71665b | Marble - #333535 Base url for Batato patterns: http://bato.to/forums/public/style_images/subway/patterns/ Patterns are: blank.png | wave.png | squares.png paper.png (Notes) | shattered.png (Sharp) | wood.png rockface.png | leather.png | honey.png vertical.png | triangles.png ---- icons used: http://modernuiicons.com backup: http://wikisend.com/download/811480/batoto_icons.zip
